contextId.occurrenceNote: The mockers exaggerate with the word "all", and they argue that since nothing in the world has ever changed, it cannot be true that Jesus will return. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: πάντα οὕτως διαμένει ἀπ’ ἀρχῆς κτίσεως
contextId.glQuote: all things have stayed the same, since the beginning of creation
